name: WittVector.teichmuller_coeff_zero
initialProofState:
p : Nat
R : Type u_1
hp : Fact (Nat.Prime p)
inst✝ : CommRing R
r : R
⊢ Eq (((WittVector.teichmuller p) r).coeff 0) r
decl:
@[simp]
theorem teichmuller_coeff_zero (r : R) : (teichmuller p r).coeff 0 = r :=
  rfl

name: WittVector.teichmuller_coeff_pos
initialProofState:
p : Nat
R : Type u_1
hp : Fact (Nat.Prime p)
inst✝ : CommRing R
r : R
n : Nat
x✝ : LT.lt 0 n
⊢ Eq (((WittVector.teichmuller p) r).coeff n) 0
decl:
@[simp]
theorem teichmuller_coeff_pos (r : R) : ∀ (n : ℕ) (_ : 0 < n), (teichmuller p r).coeff n = 0
  | _ + 1, _ => rfl

name: WittVector.teichmuller_zero
initialProofState:
p : Nat
R : Type u_1
hp : Fact (Nat.Prime p)
inst✝ : CommRing R
⊢ Eq ((WittVector.teichmuller p) 0) 0
decl:
@[simp]
theorem teichmuller_zero : teichmuller p (0 : R) = 0 := by
  ext ⟨⟩ <;> · rw [zero_coeff]; rfl

name: WittVector.map_teichmuller
initialProofState:
p : Nat
R : Type u_1
S : Type u_2
hp : Fact (Nat.Prime p)
inst✝¹ : CommRing R
inst✝ : CommRing S
f : RingHom R S
r : R
⊢ Eq ((WittVector.map f) ((WittVector.teichmuller p) r)) ((WittVector.teichmuller p) (f r))
decl:
/-- `teichmuller` is a natural transformation. -/
@[simp]
theorem map_teichmuller (f : R →+* S) (r : R) : map f (teichmuller p r) = teichmuller p (f r) :=
  map_teichmullerFun _ _ _

name: WittVector.ghostComponent_teichmuller
initialProofState:
p : Nat
R : Type u_1
hp : Fact (Nat.Prime p)
inst✝ : CommRing R
r : R
n : Nat
⊢ Eq ((WittVector.ghostComponent n) ((WittVector.teichmuller p) r)) (HPow.hPow r (HPow.hPow p n))
decl:
/-- The `n`-th ghost component of `teichmuller p r` is `r ^ p ^ n`. -/
@[simp]
theorem ghostComponent_teichmuller (r : R) (n : ℕ) :
    ghostComponent n (teichmuller p r) = r ^ p ^ n :=
  ghostComponent_teichmullerFun _ _ _
